content:
Vandhyaasutha yoohaanone -garbhatthiltthanne nernnu
Thaathanmaarkkaashakalleki thoshippichonaaraaddhyan.
Vandhyaathmaja yoohaanonaam-sthhaanapathi than jananatthil
Sabhayum makkallumaamodaal-kartthaavinu paadeedunnu.
Aanandichaallelishubaa-skariyaayum santoshichu;
Naavinu bandhanamattappoll-sthothram kartthanavan paadi.
